values:
this morning i'm 132~!!!!!! That means i've lost 2.4 lbs since sunday!!!  Some of it is probably water weight, but I don't care!! It just excites and motivates me to keep going!!

I have basically NO food in the house now, but that's probably a good thing.  

I'm going to keep restricting as much as I can...for lunch today I'm not sure what I'll do...something little or maybe nothing at all!

I WILLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL BE THIN!!!! 

YAY!!

Next goal is 130 by Friday!
128 by Sunday!!-- omg i would be fucking ecsTATIC!!!


:D

i just read on project shapeshift about the 2-4-6-8 diet... 200, 400, 600, 800 cals and repeat, add a fast on the end if necessary.  Supposedly it keeps metabolism up and works really well!!

i should do that.






today:

290 nonfat no whip mocha
300 bread (EEEK :( )
300 salad 
70 cherries
50 jelly


definitely goin to the gym tonight....
just ate an apple and now my stomach hurtz :(

i think i need to like hit my "reset" button.  

before i go back to heavy restricting, i need to shrink my stomach so i won't have SUCH issues with being hungry.

the best way to do this is, 

yep you guessed it! a fast!

I'm going to fast for a week--nothing but coffee, diet coke (because i will NEED the caffeine) and lots and lots and lots of water.  

*and since on Monday i HAVE to have lunch with my friend and she will harrass me if i don't eat, i'll allow myself some fruit and salad with fat free dressing, and that's it.*

and i'm not going to pressure myself about working out, but if it's nice enough i'm going to try to start jogging around the lake, and do some squats etc. to keep toned.

I feel so much better now that i've figured this...i had no idea why it was so hard for me to get back to how i used to be, and now i know that i need to RESET-- esp. since i won't smoke anymore, i have no way to curb my apetite.  I just need to restrict almost completely (ex. monday) until I can get back to being able to take in a little but a little only, with no problems.

I know i can do this, i know it!!!!

How many lbs. do you think I'll lose by next saturday night?  (that will be my re-weigh-in) I'm thinking 6.  

:) can't wait!!

ew FAT and no resistance.  whatever, a workout tonight will do the trick!

5 Dove Hearts 220
FF popcorn - 1 cup 20

that leaves 60 more for tonight...i'll need to go to the store and get apples and some more coke---

i was such a failure yesterday.  I'm up early, my alarm hasn't even gone off yet.  Going to get my hair done :)  
Goals today:

*Try the lipgloss trick
*water--10 glasses +
*Calories-- 400 or less.

i have to be strong.  light and free light and free*

starting it out well...

2 cups of coffee (black) and i'm off to get some 100 cal packs in an hour or two

** i hate school **


______________________________________________________________________________________

total for today:

coffee creamer fat free 25
SB cookies             100
kudos                  100
snack pack             100

500/day for a month and i will see how far i can get.  this is 

disgusting

and i refuse to continue to be like this


abstain is my key

it's 10:57 now and in one hour i will begin.  

i think also this will save me lotz of $ dollaz



and i will be so proud and happy

when i am 121 i will allow myself a new shirt.

end game= 117.


how quick can i get it?

we shall see!
